refnamediv.refpurpose: Toggles the display manager debug flag or sets the debug flag to a specified value.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: With no options, the regdebug command toggles the display manager debug flag. If a debug_level is supplied, then the display manager debug flag is set to that value.

refsection.title: EXAMPLES
refsection.para: The example shows the use of the regdebug command to toggle the display manager debug flag.

example.title: Toggle display manager debug flag.
example.para: Toggles the display manager debug flag.

refsection.title: BUG REPORTS
refsection.para: Reports of bugs or problems should be submitted via electronic mail to devs@brlcad.org
